mapper.select: select * from chatCont where chatNum = #{chatNum} order by chatTime asc
select * from chatAttach where chatNum = #{chatNum} order by chatTime asc

choose.when: insert into chatAttach values ((select max(no) from chatAttach), #{vo.chatNum}, #{vo.nickName}, #{file}, default)

mapper.select: select * from chatCont where no = ( select max(no) from chatCont where nickName = #{nickName} and chatNum = #{chatNum} )
select * from chatAttach where no = ( select max(no) from chatAttach where nickName = #{nickName} and chatNum = #{chatNum} )
